turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a couple of pizzas from Marcos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Would this be for delivery or carryout?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will pick them up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Carryout. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I want two extra larges. Do you know how many slices are in an extra large?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Extra large pizzas have 12 slices each.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. That sounds good. I will take two extra large pizzas then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Do you want original crust or new york crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Original crust please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What do you want on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one pepperoni and one cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One pepperoni and one cheese. Ok. How about crust toppers?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. I changed my mind though. Can I have salami on the first pizza instead of pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. So one salami and one cheese. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want a 2 liter of Coke.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I have added that to your order. Would you like any sides.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. So you want one extra large salami and one extra large cheese pizza and a 2 liter of coke for carryout. Correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Your order will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes. You will receive your reciept in an email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure.
